attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public
attributes.additional_details: Thousands of pets and veterans suffer every year due to fireworks. If it’s for one night only it could be managed but fireworks are on sale weeks before Nov 5th and Dec 31st
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks in supermarkets and shops

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319
